name: DESERT TANK
description:
Destroy the factories of the rebels before get to late for that. Be most fast tank commander and aggressive to achieve your objective or i need to call another to get the job?.

/// INSTRUCTIONS ///

The Game only require Keyboard to play. Destroy the rebels factory to win, Destroy or avoid the enemy tank and use the nature for advantages to you.

  • [WASD or Arrows] to Move.
  • [Left Shift] Left Rotation of Tank Turret
  • [Right Shift] Right Rotation of Tank Turret

To change the controls use the Input Menu of Unity Menu before to start the game.

Prototype Game for learning purpose the Unity Game Engine created in 1 month by 1 person.

Elias Mascheroni (EMGPY(in Unity Forums))- Programming & Graphics

Music by Eric Matyas - http://soundimage.org/

Tools Used:

  1. - GIMP
  2. - Blender
  3. - Unity Engine 5.3
  4. - Visual Studio 2015 Community

Some stuff are from Unity Technologies Tank Tutorial Assets, Check it out ;D
http://bit.ly/1P299EB

Gunplay Font used in Desert Tank by Typodermic Fonts

http://bit.ly/1SjzbUg

Thanks for Read this far and might enjoy this little game :D
